tool.name: alacarteToGeMS

param.name: workspace
param.dialogReference: This is destination where in the GeMS database will be created.

param.name: dbName
param.dialogReference: The name of the database that will be created. A database with the same name can't already exist in the workspace.

param.name: polys
param.dialogReference: The original feature class containing the map unit polygons.

param.name: arcs
param.dialogReference: The original feature class containing the contacts and faults.

param.name: GEMS toolbox
param.dialogReference: A link to a local copy of the GeMS toolbox.

param.name: crosswalk table
param.dialogReference: This table, also called a Key_Value_file, is used by the "Attribute to Key Values" tool in the GeMS toolbox to populate the approriate GeMS fields using a line's LTYPE, See the documentation for the GeMS toolbox for specifications.

param.name: datasource
param.dialogReference: This is the datasourceid that will be used for all the features in the created database.

param.name: labelname
param.dialogReference: This is name of the field that contains the label information in the original mapunit polygons feature class.

param.name: PTYPEname
param.displayname: Custom PTYPE field name in MapUnitPolys:
param.dialogReference: When a non-standard PTYPE field is used in the database input it here.

tool.summary: This tool was designed to convert older USGS ALACARTE geologic maps to barebones GeMS schema.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool was designed to convert older USGS ALACARTE geologic maps to barebones GeMS schema.
